auth.loginDescription: Enter your email and password to login
auth.registerDescription: Enter your information to create an account
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we will send you a verification code to reset your password.
auth.termsAndConditions: I agree to the terms and conditions
auth.verificationCodeSent: Verification code sent to your email
auth.verificationCodeSentTo: We have sent a 6-digit verification code to {email}
auth.registrationSuccessMessage: Your account has been created and verified. Welcome aboard!
auth.passwordResetSuccessMessage: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now login with your new password.

validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least {count} characters
validation.passwordRequireUppercase: Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter
validation.passwordRequireLowercase: Password must contain at least 1 lowercase letter
validation.passwordRequireNumber: Password must contain at least 1 number
validation.passwordRequireSpecial: Password must contain at least 1 special character
validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters

errors.INVALID_PASSWORD: Password does not meet security requirements
errors.ACCOUNT_LOCKED: Account is temporarily locked. Please try again later.
errors.SERVER_ERROR: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.SEND_FAILED: Failed to send verification code. Please try again.
errors.VERIFICATION_FAILED: Invalid verification code. Please check and try again.
errors.GOOGLE_AUTH_FAILED: Google sign-in failed. Please try again.

form.name: Name

dialog.createDescription: Add a new role to the system

delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.description: This will delete the permission {permissionCode}. This action cannot be undone.

form.codeCannotChange: Permission code cannot be changed after creation

media.title: Media Library
media.description: Manage media files in the system

folder.title: Folders
folder.createDescription: Create a new folder to organize your media
folder.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete folder "{name}"?
folder.deleteWarning: All contents inside will be deleted:

upload.title: Upload Media
upload.description: Upload images, videos, and other files
upload.dropzone: Drag and drop files here, or click to select

delete.title: Delete Media?
delete.description: This will permanently delete this media file. This action cannot be undone.
delete.inUseWarning: This media is currently being used in {count} place(s). Please remove it from those locations first.

preview.title: Title
preview.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support video playback

move.title: Move to Folder
move.description: Select a destination folder for this media

messages.deleteErrorInUse: Cannot delete media that is currently in use

auditLog.title: Audit Logs
auditLog.description: View system activity and user actions

messages.cleanupError: Failed to delete old audit logs

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your application configuration and preferences

general.title: General Settings
general.description: Configure basic site information and preferences
general.siteDescriptionPlaceholder: A brief description of your website
general.maintenanceModeDescription: When enabled, visitors will see a maintenance page

email.title: Email Settings
email.smtpConfigDescription: Configure your mail server with Nodemailer
email.passwordDescription: For Gmail, use App Password instead of your account password
email.senderInfoDescription: Default sender details for outgoing emails
email.fromEmailDescription: Email address shown in the From field
email.testEmailDescription: Send a test email to verify your SMTP settings

templates.title: Email Templates
templates.description: Create and manage email templates to send to users
templates.createDescription: Design an email template with content and dynamic variables
templates.deleteDescription: The template "{name}" will be permanently deleted. This action cannot be undone.
templates.slugDescription: Unique identifier using lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only
templates.subjectDescription: You can use dynamic variables like '{{name}}', '{{siteName}}'
templates.bodyDescriptionHtml: Use HTML to format email content
templates.bodyDescriptionMarkdown: Use Markdown to format email content
templates.isActiveDescription: Template can only be used when active
templates.clickToInsert: Click to insert at cursor position
templates.variablesDescription: Define variables that can be used in this email template

media.title: Media Settings
media.description: Configure media upload and storage settings
media.localDescription: Store files on your own server
media.cloudinaryDescription: Store and optimize media in the cloud
media.uploadPathDescription: Directory for storing uploaded files (relative to root)
media.cloudinaryConfigDescription: Get your credentials from Cloudinary Dashboard at cloudinary.com/console
media.uploadPresetDescription: Only needed if you want to apply a pre-configured preset from Cloudinary. Leave empty if not needed.
media.apiSecretDescription: Keep this secret safe, never share publicly
media.maxFileSizeDescription: Maximum file size for images and documents
media.maxVideoSizeDescription: Maximum file size for video uploads
media.allowedTypesDescription: Select which file types can be uploaded
media.imageQualityDescription: JPEG/WebP compression quality (higher = better quality, larger file)
media.autoThumbnailsDescription: Automatically create thumbnails for uploaded images
media.enableVideoEncryptionDescription: Encrypt videos to prevent unauthorized download and copying
media.videoEncryptionInfo: Videos will be encrypted using AES-128 and streamed via HLS. Only authorized users can watch.
media.encryptionMethodDescription: HLS AES-128 is recommended for maximum compatibility
media.encryptionKeyDescription: 16-byte hex key (32 characters). Keep this secret safe!
media.enableVideoWatermarkDescription: Overlay user info on video playback to prevent screen recording
media.videoQualityPresetsDescription: Select quality levels that will be generated during encoding
media.enableWatermarkDescription: Automatically add watermark to new uploads
media.enableImageOptimizationDescription: Automatically optimize images when uploading to Cloudinary to reduce file size
media.optimizationQualityDescription: Auto is recommended for balance between quality and size
media.optimizationFormatDescription: Auto will choose WebP/AVIF if browser supports

security.title: Security Settings
security.passwordPolicyDescription: Define password requirements for user accounts
security.sessionLockoutDescription: Configure session timeout and account lockout
security.sessionTimeoutDescription: Time of inactivity before session expires
security.maxAttemptsDescription: Number of failed login attempts before account lockout
security.lockoutDurationDescription: How long account stays locked after too many failed attempts

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.description: Configure how and when notifications are sent
notifications.emailNotificationsDescription: Configure which events trigger email notifications
notifications.newUserDescription: Send email when a new user registers
notifications.passwordResetDescription: Send email when password is reset
notifications.loginAlertDescription: Send email on new login from unknown device
notifications.systemAlertDescription: Send email for critical system events
notifications.realtimeUpdatesDescription: Show live updates without page refresh
notifications.digestTimeDescription: Time to send digest emails (server timezone)

seo.title: SEO & Analytics
seo.description: Configure search engine optimization and tracking
seo.metaTagsDescription: Default meta tags for search engines
seo.metaTitleDescription: Used when page doesn't have custom title
seo.metaDescriptionPlaceholder: A compelling description of your website
seo.keywordsDescription: Press Enter or comma to add keywords
seo.openGraphDescription: Control how your site appears when shared on social media
seo.enableIndexingDescription: Let search engines index your site
seo.robotsTxtDescription: Leave empty to use default settings

localization.title: Localization
localization.autoDetectDescription: Detect user's preferred language from browser
localization.rtlSupportDescription: Enable right-to-left layout for RTL languages

backup.title: Backup & Restore
backup.createBackupDescription: This will create a backup of your database and settings. This may take a few minutes.
backup.enableAutoBackupDescription: Automatically backup your data on a schedule
backup.retentionDescription: Number of backups to keep before deleting oldest
backup.backupContentDescription: Choose what to include in backups
backup.includeDatabaseDescription: Backup all database tables and records
backup.locationDescription: Select where backups will be stored
backup.restoreDescription: Are you sure you want to restore data from this backup? This will overwrite current settings and data.
